trans-unit.source: The Pkcs9SigningTime class defines the signing date and time of a signature.
trans-unit.target: Pkcs9SigningTime 类定义的签名日期和时间的签名。

trans-unit.source: A Pkcs9SigningTime object can be used as an authenticated attribute of a <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner"></xref> object when an authenticated date and time are to accompany a digital signature.
trans-unit.target: 可以为经过身份验证的属性使用 Pkcs9SigningTime 对象<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner"></xref>对象时要对数字签名附加经过身份验证的日期和时间。

trans-unit.source: A signing time attribute is also available in CAPICOM.
trans-unit.target: 签名的时间属性也会 CAPICOM 中提供。

trans-unit.source: The Pkcs9SigningTime constructor creates an instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9SigningTime"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Pkcs9SigningTime 构造函数创建的实例<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9SigningTime"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9SigningTime> class has the following default property values.

|Property|Default value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9SigningTime.SigningTime%2A>|The current date and time| If you want to specify a specific date and time for the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9SigningTime> object, use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9SigningTime.%23ctor%28System.DateTime%29> constructor.
trans-unit.target: |属性 |默认值 | |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9SigningTime.SigningTime%2A>|当前日期和时间 | 如果你想要指定特定日期和时间<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9SigningTime>对象，请使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9SigningTime.%23ctor%28System.DateTime%29>构造函数。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9SigningTime.%23ctor%28System.DateTime%29> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9SigningTime> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9SigningTime.SigningTime%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Pkcs9SigningTime constructor creates an instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9SigningTime"></xref> class by using the specified array of byte values as the encoded signing date and time of the content of a CMS/PKCS #7 message.
trans-unit.target: Pkcs9SigningTime 构造函数创建的实例<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9SigningTime"></xref>通过使用指定的字节值数组作为编码的签名日期和时间的 CMS/PKCS #7 消息的内容的类。

trans-unit.source: An array of byte values that specifies the encoded signing date and time of the CMS/PKCS #7 message.
trans-unit.target: 指定的编码的签名日期和时间的 CMS/PKCS #7 消息的字节值数组。

trans-unit.source: The Pkcs9SigningTime constructor creates an instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9SigningTime"></xref> class by using the specified signing date and time.
trans-unit.target: Pkcs9SigningTime 构造函数创建的实例<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9SigningTime"></xref>类通过使用指定的签名日期和时间。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DateTime> structure that represents the signing date and time of the signature.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.DateTime>结构，它表示的签名日期和时间的签名。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: This method replaces the current <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9SigningTime> object with the specified <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData> object.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将替换当前<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9SigningTime>使用指定的对象<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData>对象。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9SigningTime>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData"></xref> object from which to copy information.
The SigningTime property retrieves a <xref:System.DateTime> structure that represents the date and time that the message was signed.
trans-unit.target: SigningTime 属性检索<xref:System.DateTime>结构，它表示的日期和时间的消息的签名。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DateTime> structure that contains the date and time the document was signed.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.DateTime>结构，其中包含的日期和时间文档的签名。</xref:System.DateTime>
